activities.loc: Br I Courtroom, 3rd Fl, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason E Otis

records.addlTxt:
10:35 AM Defendant Jason E Otis not in court. Attorney Gary S. Cirilli in court for Jason E Otis. Prosecuting attorney Mary M Sowinski Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 22CF127, 22FO786 & 22FO787. Blood results not back yet - will set out. Bond continued. adj. 10:37 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 17, 2023 at 02:30 pm.

records.descr: Answer to demand for discovery and inspection

records.addlTxt:
2:12 p.m. Calling 22CF127 / 22FO786 / 22FO787. Defendant Jason E Otis by Zoom - unable to communicate but can hear actions.  Attorney Gary S. Cirilli in court for Jason E Otis.  Prosecuting attorney Mary M Sowinski Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over.  Sowinski states Information will be filed that mirrors Complaint. Cirilli willing to proceed to Arraignment today; waives further reading and enters not guilty pleas. Bond continued. adj.  2:16 p.m.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
2:30 PM Prosecuting attorney Mary M Sowinski in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason E Otis in court. Attorney Gary Cirilli in Court. Calling 22CF127, 22FO786 & 22FO787. In receipt of complaint, waive reading - set for preliminary hearing - time limits waived. Cirilli statement to 22FO786 - would like to dismiss. State to review. Bail continued. adj. 02:33 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:45 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason E Otis in court. Calling 22CF127, 22FO786 & 22FO787. Court review of case. Defendant states hiring attorney Gary Cirilli. Bond continued. adj. 02:46 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

1:22 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason E Otis appeared by video, in custody. Court Reporter appearing by Video. Calling 22CF127, 22FO786 & 22FO787. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Pfeifer statement to bail. Court questions Defendant on address/household/employment. Friend now appearing in court - will make bail for Defendant. Court sets bond. adj. 01:38 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
